name: Witch Warp
description:
(Updated source code so it would compile for windows too)

Use your mouse to warp to a new location, avoid falling blocks and bugs, pick up potions! Please use a modern browser to see shader warp effect.

I made this game for the GameMaker Studio 2 Beta Jam 2. Theme is magic and shaders were a bonus. I had to learn shaders so the game is not as "Done" as I would like but I ran out of time.

The Source Code is on GIT HUB
